attributes.action: Fix a date for Boris Johnson and Sir Keir Starmer to hold a press-up contest.
attributes.additional_details: As this is apparently a beneficial asset for the country leader to hold, it would benefit the country and the voters to know which of the two party leaders is most proficient in this skill.
attributes.background: Boris has suggested that doing press-ups is in some way a beneficial skill for running the country. Please hold a competition between Boris Johnson and Sir Keir Starmer to identify which of them is best able to pass this test

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be a decision for the individuals involved, not the UK Government or Parliament as a whole.
